body.name: Ninja CM401 Specialty 10-Cup Coffee Maker with 4 Brew Styles for Ground Coffee, Built-in Water Reservoir, Fold-Away Frother & Glass Carafe, Black

features: 4 BREW STYLES: Select from one of the four, versatile brew styles: Classic, Rich, Over Ice, or Specialty Brew.
SPECIALTY BREWS: Brew a super-rich coffee concentrate that you can use to create delicious lattes, macchiatos, cappuccinos, and other coffeehouse-style drinks.
MAKE ICED COFFEE: Brew fresh over ice for flavorful iced coffee that's never watered down.
6 BREW SIZES: Brew anything from a single cup or travel size to a half or full carafe in your coffee maker. 6 sizes include Cup, XL Cup, Travel Mug, Multi-Serve Travel Mug, Half Carafe & Full Carafe.
NO PODS REQUIRED: Use your favorite grounds to create a single-serve coffee—no reusable pod required.
BUILT-IN, FOLD-AWAY FROTHER: Turns hot or cold milk/milk alternative into silky-smooth froth. Removable for easy cleaning.
REMOVABLE WATER RESERVOIR: Conveniently carry the 40-oz. removable water reservoir to your sink for easy filling.
EASY TO CLEAN: The glass carafe, brew-through lid, permanent filter, removable filter holder, water reservoir, flip-top lid, frother whisk, and scoop are all top-rack dishwasher safe.
AUTOMATIC SHUTOFF: After one hour of inactivity, the system will power off automatically.
WHAT'S INCLUDED: Ninja Specialty Coffee Maker, 50-oz (10-cup) Glass Carafe, Fold-Away Frother, Permanent filter, 40-oz. Removable water reservoir, & Ninja Smart Scoop.
body.description: Bring the coffeehouse home with the Ninja Specialty Coffee Maker. Combine super-rich coffee concentrates with hot or cold frothed milk to create delicious coffeehouse-style drinks or enjoy flavorful iced coffee that never tastes watered down. Brew anything from a single cup to a half carafe or a full carafe using your favorite grounds—no pods required.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Coffeehouse drinks are now your specialty. With 6 brew sizes, 4 different brew types, and a built-in frother, you can create everything from hot or iced lattes, macchiatos, iced coffee, cappuccinos, and other coffeehouse-style drinks in the Ninja Specialty Coffee Maker.

4 Brew Styles Classic & Rich Brew Classic brew is all about balanced flavor, while rich brew provides a more intense taste. Either style makes a perfect start to your morning. Iced Coffee Brew fresh over ice for flavorful ice coffee that’s never watered down. Specialty Brew Brew super-rich coffee concentrate you can use to create delicious lattes, macchiatos, cappuccinos, and other coffeehouse-style drinks.

Features & Benefits 6 Brew Sizes Choose single cup, XL single cup, travel mug, XL travel mug, half carafe, or full carafe. Fold-Away Frother Transform hot or cold milk into silky froth in seconds with our built-in frother. No Pods Required Pod-free means unlimited variety, customized brew, and less plastic waste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing does it all
reviews.reviewText: So far I am very impressed with this machine. It makes 6 brew sizes, from small cup to a full carafe, has a very sturdy fold down pedestal for making the cup sizes, fits a large travel mug, has a built in frother, and even has storage for the included double scoop. I like my coffee strong and, on the Rich setting, this makes the best cup I've ever had from a drip machine. The water reservoir is detachable and the top comes off easily for easy cleaning, you'll need a bottle brush to clean the carafe but that's pretty normal. I haven't tried the cold brew yet but am looking forward to that this summer. It is very feature packed for this price range and makes great coffee!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE THIS COFFEE MAKER!!! Every feature works perfectly and the coffee is as good as it gets!!!
reviews.reviewText: I'm a terrible Amazon user because I order 90-110 items per month and this is probably my 3rd review. That's how much I LOVE this coffee maker. My coffee is everything, and I like it strong and bold, which is why pods just don't work for me. One of the things I like most is that is has so many size settings from one cup to a carafe including two travel mug sizes. And something I have not seen any other coffee maker is that, because the brew space is tall enough for a carafe, it allows you to also brew directly into the tall travel mug 👍🏼 so no dirty carafe to wash every morning. And the single cup platform is very sturdy, can handle large mugs, pulls down from the inside wall and flips right back up out of the way. There is an espresso setting that uses just the right amount of water which you can drink as espresso or as the base for other coffee drinks including lattes. And this is a critical feature that more coffee makers are starting to have: When you press start, it dispenses enough steaming water to properly wet the grounds, waits about 10 seconds, then brews. It makes any coffee taste better, but is especially important for those of use who like it strong. Every feature on this thing works EXACTLY as you hope it would. So many products describe a lot of features, but honestly they’re often crappy and poorly designed so they don't work well, or they require keeping extra attachments somewhere. It's like Ninja thought of every typical frustrating thing about coffee makers and fixed them! The positioning of the frothing arm is perfect - when not in use you don't even notice it; can't even see if you're right in front of the machine. But just reach back and it right there in the perfect spot to froth your milk. The pieces are simple and detach easily for cleaning. AND LAST BUT NOT LEAST, something as simple as a recessed holder for a two sided (1 & 2 tsp) coffee scoop!! It's right at your fingertips, you snap it back in when you're done and you don't notice it because it's recessed. BUY THIS COFFEE MAKER - YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED!! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your Next Coffee Makin’ Move!
reviews.reviewText: After reading SO many reviews and researching products, I’m so happy with this guy! My issue was finding a coffee maker that had a time delay brew setting, drip setting AND espresso option. With the “specialty” and “rich” setting, this machine has me covered.I can brew espresso for lattes, single cups for quick days, and full carafes for when I have company. Also, I didn’t think I’d notice a difference but the FLAVOR of the brew is so much better than my old machine!!The size is compact and the parts are so easy to clean. Highly recommend if you’re looking to elevate your coffee game at a reasonable price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this machine!
reviews.reviewText: To start, it is very well packaged yet very easy to remove from the box. This is a biggie for me. No styrofoam packed into a box the seems to be a bit small for the product. This has heavy duty cardboard on top, the lifts easily to give access to the coffeemaker.The coffee maker is very easy to use, set the delay feature or brew immediately. The frother is amazing.Easy to measure how much you want to make with the measuring spoon included, with the amount of spoons to use. The resevoir is marked clearly with the amount of water to use for the amount of coffee your making..The only not so great issue is the opening to the pot is a tad small for washing. You can't put your hand into it to scrub so a brush is necessary.This is the best coffee maker I have ever had. I highly recommend this.
Like all the other products from ninja it is easy to use and looks amazing.

Producto muy elegante y fácil de utilizar. Ocupa un poco más de espacio que una cafetera convencional. Extrae muy bien el sabor del café, si quieres una jarra completa la prepara en poco más de 10 minutos.El espumador funciona de maravilla, lo único es que debes calentar previamente la leche. El deposito de agua al ser extraible, permite llenar la jarra más fácil y la limpieza es mejor
Nice design and well worth the extra $$. Coffee taste great and machine works as expected
El café queda muy bien, excelente para preparar distintas bebidas y muy fácil de usar

I really love this brewer! It's taken a bit ofvtrial and error to figure out our general brewing preference, and it was a bit frustrating that we could not choose the specific number of cups to brew, but it has worked out pretty well. This brewer has some really great options for brewing. The only thing I have not tried yet is brewing over ice, but everything else works well. And it looks pretty great on the counter!
